text: Kintu yakhana amadera tarapha theke tadera kache satya eseche tara balache -- ''musake yemana de'oya hayechila take kena temanata de'oya ha’la na?’’ Ki! Musake itipurbe ya de'oya hayechila tate ki tara abisbasa kare ni? Tara bale -- ''dukhana jadu -- eke an'yera prsthaposakata karache.’’ Ara tara bale -- ''amara alabat sabatate'i abisbasi.’’
